turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, good day. I want to order a coffee from Starbucks Espresso Beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a starbucks esspresso?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great and what starbucks did you want to pick it up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, Starbucks in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can I get a more exact address? There are several in new york city.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There are three starbucks in that location. Which did you mean?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give me their locations.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Or better still, I'll go for a Starbucks at 1500 Broadway, New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. That's one of the ones on the list.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: So, can I go ahead with my order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what did you want to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need a Schweitzer.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande espresso with whipped cream and extra sugar from the starbucks on Broadway in New York City.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a grande espresso with whipped cream and extra sugar from the starbucks on Broadway in New York City.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: exactly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. It'll be ready soon. You'll get a reciept via text soon as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. How soon?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: in a minute.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right.
